<h1 align="center">
  Reactgrid website & docs
</h1>


# ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Clone package**


    ```sh
      git clone https://github.com/silevis/reactgrid-website.git
    ```

2.  **Install dependencies**

    ```sh
    cd reactgrid-website
    git checkout gh-pages-dev
    npm i
    ```

2.  **Run dev enviroment**

    ```sh
    gatsby develop
    ```

2.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!

    _Note: You'll also see a second link: _`http://localhost:8000/___graphql`_. This is a tool you can use to experiment with querying your data. Learn more about using this tool in the [Gatsby tutorial](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/tutorial/part-five/#introducing-graphiql)._

# ðŸ’« Deploy

1.  Build static website from ```gh-pages-dev``` branch
    ```sh
      gatsby build
    ```

2.  Make build, then copy files from ```build/``` directory to e.g. ```desktop/build/```
    ```sh
      gatsby build
    ```

3.  Change branch
    ```sh
      github checkout gh-pages
    ```

4.  Remove all old build files from current branch (```gh-pages```)
    
5.  Paste files 

6. Make commit and push
    ```sh
      git commit -m "new wersion"
      git push
    ```
